Liezel continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock the store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

loans.name: Nutsa

texts.en:
Nutsa is a 59-year-old hard-working woman from the village of Lesichine. She lives alone and works hard to reach a satisfying living condition. Nutsa has her own agricultural land, which she cultivates seasonally and harvests nuts and maize. She generates approximately 100 GEL monthly, that is hardly enough to meet even basic needs. She has a great desire to start dairy farming and generate more income. Nutsa requested a loan of 800 GEL for purchasing a dairy cow to start producing and trading with cheese. This will give her a chance to increase her productivity and make a better style of life. 
This motivated woman needs help and will be really grateful. This credit will be a great support for her. Nutsa is thankful to Kiva lenders for giving her a chance to generate income.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and produce cheese

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and seed potatoes.

loans.name: Reina Arely

texts.es:
Reina de 28 años de edad, estudió hasta 6º grado, está soltera y ella se dedica a la agricultura y al comercio, con ella vive sus padres y 2 hermanos, pero solo una persona depende de ella.

Reina tiene un negocio de venta de pupusas, tiene 2 años de dedicarse a esta actividad que aprendió por medio de una tía, aparte de vender pupusas se dedica a la crianza de ganado y cerdos, con ella se involucra sus hermanos y su madre. 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una cocina para hacer pupusas, además comprará 3 cerdos para criarlos y engordarlos, con esto mejorará su calidad de vida ya que tendrá mas ingresos. 

Ella planea que su negocio de venta de pupusas crezca y que sus cerdos se desarrollen en buen estado.
texts.en: Reina is 28 years old, went to school until 6th grade, is single and works in agriculture and sales. She lives with her parents and two brothers, but has only one dependent. Reina has a business selling pupusas, and has been working for two years in this trade that she learned from her aunt. Aside from selling pupusas she works in raising livestock and pigs, and her brothers and mother are involved as well. She needs the loan to purchase a kitchen to make pupusas and will also purchase 3 pigs to raise and fatten, and with this will improve her quality of life with increased income. Her plan is to grow her pupusa business and for her pigs to develop in good health.

loans.use: To purchase a kitchen to make pupusas, and also buy 3 pigs to raise and fatten.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Esta es la historia de un hombre de gran corazón y simpatía, que contagia a las personas que tiene a su alrededor con buenas energías y actitud positiva.
El, a pesar de no haber recibido ningún tipo de educación tiene grandes conocimientos en el área de la agricultura.
El tiene un pequeño cultivo de papa y zanahoria el cual quiere nutrir con productos de mantenimiento de tierras y con fertilizantes.
Es por esto que solicita un préstamo para la compra de estos insumos poder así tener unos cultivos mejor cuidados y de mejor calidad.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener un gran cultivo y generar empleo.
texts.en: This is the story of a likable man with a big heart, who spreads his positive attitude and infectious good vibes to the people around him. In spite of never having gone to school, he's very knowledgeable in the field of agriculture. He has a small crop of potatoes and carrots that he wants to boost with soil maintenance products and fertiliizers. That's why he's requesting a loan to purchase these products so he can have better managed, higher quality crops. His biggest dream is to have a great crop and create jobs.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Alberto Isabel

texts.es:
Alberto de 34 años de edad, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica al comercio de productos de belleza, con él viven sus hijos que están estudiando, por lo tanto dependen de él. 

Él presta sus servicios como militar, además se dedica a criar ganado, el trabajo de militar está a 30 minutos de su casa. 

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar ganado y fertilizantes.

Él sueña con que sus cultivos se desarrollen bien y obtener mas ingresos para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Alberto, who is 34 years old, is married. His wife sells beauty products. With him live his children, who are in school and therefore depend on him.

He serves as a soldier. In addition he raises cattle. The military work is 30 minutes from his home.

He will use the loan to buy cattle and fertilizer.

He dreams that his crops will develop well and obtain more income for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy cattle and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for her beauty salon and also to buy furniture.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase adobe, cement, wood, nails, etc for his home.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco tiene 62 años de edad, estudió hasta 4º grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y hace ventas los fines de semana (pasteles, yuca etc.), tiene 5 hijos y no dependen de él porque ya son mayores. 

Él se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería desde temprana edad, trabajo que siempre ha hecho toda su familia. 

El crédito lo necesita para sembrar camote, maíz, yuca, pepino, etc. comprar abono, fertilizantes y venenos. 

Su sueño es aumentar su trabajo para obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir las necesidades familiares.
texts.en:
Francisco is 62 years old. He went to school through 4th grade. He is married and his wife does the domestic work and sells cakes, yucca, etc., on the weekends. He has 5 children who do not depend on him because they are already adults.

He has worked in agriculture and livestock-raising from an early age, work that his whole family has always done.

He needs the loan to buy compost, fertilizers, and poisons in order to plant sweet potatoes, corn, yucca, cucumbers, etc.

His dream is to increase his work to obtain better income to cover the family's needs.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, and poisons to plant sweet potatoes, corn, yucca, cucumbers, etc.

loans.name: María Teresa

texts.es: María tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijas de 14 años y 10 años de edad. María es una mujer  muy trabajadora y comprometida con su familia quien desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. María ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir un cuarto y pavimentar el piso. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc.
texts.en: Maria is 31 years old and lives in her own house with her two daughters, ages 14 and 10. Maria is a hardworking woman who's committed to her family and wants to improve she and her family's quality of life. She's made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI because she wants to build a room and pave the floor. With the amount requested she will purchase cement, sand, bricks, iron, etc.

loans.use: To purchase: cement, sand, bricks, iron, etc to build a room.

loans.name: Muhororo Group

texts.fr:
Audace fait partie du groupe  Muhororo  et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 40 ans et est marié à Julienne une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 7 enfants âgés de 4 à 16 ans.

Il a sous sa charge un enfant membre de sa famille élargie et qui étudie.

Il fait le commerce de médicaments dans sa pharmacie (paracétamol, quinine,…) depuis  20 ans. 

C’est son premier crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de  paracétamols, quinines comprimés, ibuprofènes,… à revendre dans sa pharmacie, pour gagner plus.

Dans les années à prochaine, il voudrait construire une maison en matériaux durables et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Audace is part of the Muhororo group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 40 years old and is married to Julienne, a retail merchant. Together they have seven children aged from four to sixteen years. 

He also takes care of a child from his extended family, who attends school. 

For the past 20 years he has been trading medications in his pharmacy (paracetamol, quinine, ...). 

This is his first credit loan with Turame. With the KIVA loan, he will increase his working capital and buy a large amount of paracetamol, quinine tablets, ibuprofen, ..., for resale in his pharmacy, to earn more. 

In following years, he would like to build a house made ​​of durable materials and see his children pursue their studies.

loans.use: increase his working capital and buy a large amount of paracetamol, quinine tablets, ibuprofen,..., for resale in his pharmacy, to earn more.

loans.name: Jemar

texts.en:
Jemar is married with two children. He operates a swine fattening business to make a living. His wife works abroad in order to save for their future. 

Jemar has been in this field of business for more than 2 years and he earns better to provide for his family. Recently, he borrowed a loan from GDMPC Micro Credit to buy feeding supplies and additional piglets. 

In the future, the couple wants to own a house. He wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy feeding supplies and additional piglets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Home improvement (paint the walls, fix the roof)

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Buy plastic items, kitchenware, textiles and shoes.

loans.name: Yoel Sixto

texts.es:
Yoel esta muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una computadora, la cual le será de gran utilidad, ya que actualmente iniciara algunos cursos de computación y con ello podrá practicar lo aprendido.

Yel es un joven muy trabajador, labora como chofer de mototaxi, empleo que es su única fuente de ingresos y con lo cual puede apoyar a sus padres y hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Poder tener una carrera y ser un gran profesional”.
texts.en: Yoel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they've provided him he'll be able to purchase a computer, which will be very useful since he's going to be starting some computer classes and this will allow him to practice what he learns. Yoel is a hardworking young man, who works as as a motorcycle taxi driver. That employment is his only source of income and with it he's able to support his parents and turn his dream into a reality: "To have a career and be a great professional."

loans.use: To purchase a computer.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.en: Fotima is 42 years old in lives in the Qubadiyon Region. She is married. Her husband now works abroad. Her children attend school. Fotima works hard to provider her children with everything necessary and to allow them to receive a good education. For about two years, she buys cattle for resale. She buys bull calves at the market, fattens them, and later resells at the same market. Thanks to this business she has a source of income. At present, Fotima is having financial difficulties, and she would like to obtain a loan in order to buy a calf and develop her cattle business. Please support Fotima!

loans.use: to buy a calf.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en:
Alejandra learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. She tried her luck doing a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. 

Alejandra requested another loan to pay for seedlings and compost. This will give her farming income a big boost. Alejandra looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost.

loans.name: Leonilo

texts.en:
In the future, Leonilo wants to be a teacher like his father. He is studying at the Western Mindanao State University in Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

He is 18 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur with his family. He is the second child of three siblings. His father is a teacher in their home town, while his mother is a businesswoman. 

His previous loans were used for the previous year's tuition fee. This semester, he took a new loan to pay his tuition fee for the first semester of this current school year.

Leonilo is determined to finished his course in order to help his family in the future.

loans.use: to pay his tuition fee for the first semester of this current school year.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 46 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been running the general store for 15 years and earns additional income from poultry.

Anita aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Dubian Adolfo

texts.es:
Dubian planea comprar un negocio en el que trabaja como empleado los fines de semana.
El negocio se trata de una tienda abarrotes ubicada en una excelente zona comercial del municipio de El Peñol.
Tiene gran experiencia en el manejo de estos negocios y considera que ya es hora de tener su propio negocio con ingresos independientes y en donde pueda manejar su propio horario.
Pide un préstamo para poder comprar el negocio de contado y poder así cumplir con su sueño.
Hasta ahora no ha visto ninguna dificultad y por el contrario encuentra muchas ventajas en la compra de este establecimiento.
Confía en las entidades que respaldan a las personas emprendedoras en el cumplimiento de sus objetivos y sueños.
texts.en:
Dubian plans to buy the business where he currently works as an employee on the weekends. The business is a grocery store that is located in a thriving commercial center in the town of El Peñol. Dubian has a great deal of experience in managing these types of businesses, so he believes it is time for him to have his own business in order to generate income independently and be able to set his own schedule.

Dubian is requesting a loan so that he can purchase the business with cash, thus fulfilling his dream. Until now, he has not experienced any difficulties, so he sees that there are many advantages to buying this establishment. He places his trust in organizations that support entrepreneurs who want to fulfill their goals and dreams.

loans.use: to buy a grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy salt-water fish

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es:
José de 50 años, esta acompañado, es padre de 3 hijos; dos de los cuales viven con él,  su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios del hogar y cuando tiene tiempo libre le ayuda junto con sus hijos a José en lo que es la agricultura. José solo logró estudiar hasta segundo grado.  A sus hijos con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación les logro dar una estudio de noveno grado.

José trabaja tambien de jornalero en una hacienda desde hace varios años y de igual manera se dedica a lo que es la agricultura trabajo que lo realizan desde hace 35 años y que lo hacen en conjunto con sus hijos y su compañera de vida.

El crédito que ha solicitado lo utilizara para comprar los insumos necesarios, para la siembra del maíz como semilla, abono y fertilizantes para la tierra.

José sueña con tener una casa mejor de la que tiene, poder mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y compañera de vida y lograr tener una mayor producción de maíz.
texts.en: Jose is 50 years old, in a couple, and is a father of 3 children, two of whom live with him. His partner works as a homemaker and in her free time helps Jose and the children do agricultural work. He only managed to go to school until second grade, but with lots of effort and dedication he was able to keep his children in school up to the ninth grade. Jose has also worked as a day laborer at an hacienda for several years and in addition he works in agriculture, a job he's been doing for 35 years which he does together with his children and partner. He'll use the requested loan to purchase necessary supplies to plant corn, such as seed, manure, and fertilizers for the soil. Jose dreams of having a house better than his current one, improving the quality of life of his children and his partner, and achieving higher corn production.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies such as seed, fertilizer, manure, among other things.

loans.name: Hector Sandro

texts.es:
Hector es un hombre trabajador, tiene 40 años de edad, es soltero y vive en San Juan de Lurigancho junto a su familia.
Tiene un taxi que alquila y con él obtiene ingresos con los que apoya con los gastos del hogar. También trabaja como ayudante de Albañil y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, luchador y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Hector está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá remodelar su vivienda como pintarrajear las paredes y comprar un juego de sala para que su familia pueda sentirse cómoda viviendo en un ambiente agradable.
texts.en:
Hector is a hardworking man. He is 40 years old, single, and lives with his family in San Juan de Lurigancho.

He has a taxi that he rents out in order to generate income for the household expenses. Hector also works as a masonry assistant and is doing well because he is responsible, determined, and has the drive to succeed. In addition, he wants to improve his family’s quality of life.

Hector is grateful to the Kiva lenders because of the assistance they have provided. He will be able to remodel his home by whitewashing the walls and purchase a living room set so that his family can live comfortably in a pleasant environment.

loans.use: to remodel his house and to purchase a living room set.

loans.name: Marlon José

texts.es:
Marlon de 33 años de edad, es albañil, estudió hasta noveno grado y por la pobreza en que vivía  le fue difícil seguir estudiando, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen una hermosa hija de 5 años de edad.

Marlon se dedica a la albañilería desde que dejó de estudiar, un amigo se esmeró en enseñarle este trabajo y hoy le agradece infinitamente, ya que es el soporte de su hogar, con este trabajo sale adelante y le puede brindar el pan de cada día a su familia.

Utizará el préstamo para comprar herramientas que son necesarias para su trabajo tales como pulidora, cinta métrica, pala, entre otras mas.

El sueño para Marlon, para el futuro es ampliar y mejorar su trabajo para tener mayores ingresos y que a su esposa e  hija no les falte lo necesario, así mismo ayudarle hasta que llegue a ser una profesional de éxito y pueda defenderse en la vida.
texts.en: Marlon is 33 years old, a mason, and went to school up until the 9th grade when poverty made it difficult to continue studying. He's in a relationship and his partner is a homemaker. They have a beautiful five year old daughter. Marlon has worked in masonry since he stopped studying. A friend went to a lot of effort to teach him this job and he's infinitely grateful, since it's the source of support for his household and with this job he makes ends meet and puts food on his family's table. He will use the loan to purchase necessary tools for his job, such as a polisher, measuring tape, and a shovel, among other things. Marlon's dream is to expand and improve his job in the future to earn higher income so that his wife and daughter don't lack for essentials, as well as help his daughter become a successful professional capable of making her way in the world.

loans.use: To purchase a polisher, measuring tape, a shovel, among other things for his job as a mason.

loans.name: María Alejandra

texts.es:
María de 55 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar ya que en aquellos tiempos no habían escuelas cerca, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica  a la agricultura, ella trabaja poco pues por su edad se enferma bastante, tiene 4 hijos, dos viven en USA y los otros 2 están acá, con ella vive la nuera y no depende nadie de ella porque todos son mayores y trabajan para cubrir sus propios gastos.


María siempre se ha dedicado a los quehaceres del hogar ya que su esposo ha sido el que ha trabajado para cubrir los gastos del hogar, y también porque su madre se dedicaba a lo mismo y María aprendió la actividad.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar 2 fletes de cuartón para reparar la vivienda porque esta bastante dañada y caen demasiadas goteras cada vez que llueve y esto les provocan enfermedades respiratorias y gripes.

Su sueño es ir mejorando poco a poco su casa para vivir en mejores condiciones junto con su familia.
texts.en:
María is 55 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study because there were no schools nearby in those days. María is in a relationship and her partner works in agriculture. She only does a little work because she gets sick at her age. María has four children, two of whom live in the United States while the other two still live in El Salvador. She currently lives with her daughter-in-law and has no dependents since all of her children are grown and work in order to cover their own expenses.

María has always dedicated her time to the household duties since her husband worked in order to cover the household expenses. Her mother had done the same thing, which is how María learned everything.

She needs a loan in order to buy two loads of beams for repairing her home, which is extensively damanged. Water leaks through each time it rains, which can lead to influenza and respiratory illnesses. Her dream is to make gradual improvements to her house so that she and her family can live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy two loads of beams for making home repairs.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es: Yrene tiene 56 años de edad es casada. Ella se dedica a la venta de locería y productos descartable. Ella inicio con la venta de tamales comida hace 08 años. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más tazas platos y productos descartables. El grupo “RENACER” agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Yrene es la segunda del lado derecho viste chompa de a rayas crema beige.
texts.en:
Yrene is 56 years old and married. She sells dishware and disposable products. Yrene started out selling tamales when she was eight years old. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of more cups, plates, and disposable products.

The group “Renacer” (To Be Reborn) appreciates the Kiva lenders for providing this loan. In the photo, Yrene is on the second row on the right-hand side, wearing a sweater with cream and beige stripes.

loans.use: to buy cups, plates, and disposable products.

loans.name: Sofía Margarita

texts.es:
Sofía de 29 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta bachillerato, está casada, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, procrearon 2 hijos, las edades de éstos son 6 y 2 años, son muy unidos trabajan arduamente para sostener el hogar y a sus hijos.

Sofía se dedica a la agricultura desde que se casó, ya que es muy luchadora y se propuso ayudar a su esposo para salir adelante juntos, conoce este trabajo desde hace 8 años aproximadamente y es por eso que ahora se le facilita el cultivo de la tierra, tiene mucha experiencia, se levanta muy temprano para hacer los quehaceres del hogar, luego va a dejar a sus pequeños donde un familiar que vive cerca de su casa para que se los cuiden,  para después ir a trabajar con su esposo al campo.

Utilizará el préstamo para comprar los insumos agrícolas tales como fertilizantes, sulfato, abono, entre otros, para que su cosecha de buen fruto.

 El sueño de Sofía para un futuro es poderles brindar estudio a sus pequeños hijos hasta que sean profesionales de éxito y así se puedan defender en la vida honradamente.
texts.en: Sofia is 29 years old, a housewife, and studied up until high school. She's married and her husband works in agriculture. They have two kids, ages 2 and 6, and they're a tight-knit family who work diligently to support their household and children. Sofia has worked in agriculture since she got married, since she's hardworking and resolved to help her husband so they can get ahead together. She's been familiar with this job since she was 8 years old approximately and that's why farming now comes easy to her, because of her vast experience, and she gets up early to do chores in the house. Then she drops off the kids with a relative nearby who takes care of them, so she can go work in the field with her husband. She'll use the loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, sulfates, manure, among other things so that she can have a good harvest. Sofia's dream in the future is to put her little ones in school so that they can become successful professionals and make an honest living.

loans.use: To purchase  fertilizer, sulfate, manure, among other things to have a good harvest.

loans.name: Dúo Perlas De Oro Group

texts.es:
DUO PERLAS DE ORO
Doña Ana Cristina de 36 años de edad es originaria de la aldea xetzac, del municipio de Tecpán, bajo su responsabilidad están sus cuatro hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de sandalias y a la venta de delantales.
Gracias al apoyo de su esposo y al apoyo de sus hijos  ella sigue trabajando con su negocio, ya que con la ayuda de su familia se está ayudando para salir adelante.
Ella sueña con ampliar mas su negocio surtirlo con más variedad de productos y así podrá tener mejores ganancias y poder mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor, ya que hoy en día la educación es muy importante, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de material para la elaboracion y venta de sandalias
texts.en:
“Perlas de Oro” (Golden Pearls) Group

Doña Ana Cristina is 36 years old and originally from the neighborhood of Xetzac in the town of Tecpán. She is responsible for four young children. Ana Cristina manufactures sandals and also sells aprons.

Thanks to the support from her husband and children, she is able to continue working at her business. As a result, she is able to help her family and assist them with moving forward.

Ana Cristina dreams of expanding her business by restocking it with a wider variety of products. This would enable her to generate better income so that she can send her children to school for a better future. Today education is very important. She is requesting a loan so that she can buy materials for manufacturing and selling sandals.

loans.use: to buy materials for manufacturing and selling sandals.

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es: María tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 6 años y 14 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la confección y venta de mosquiteros y venta de helados. Es así como desde hace mucho tiempo se gana a vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro de retención para lo cual necesita materiales como: arena, cemento, ladrillo, hierro, etc.
texts.en: Maria is 40 years old and lives in her own house with her two children, ages 6 and 14. Her job is making and selling mosquito nets and ice cream. That's how she's been making a living and supporting her household for a long time. With the desire to improve her quality of life she's requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a retaining wall for which she needs materials such as: sand, cement, bricks, iron, etc.

loans.use: To purchase: sand, cement, bricks, iron, etc to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy shoes, fabrics and plasticware

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for higher education.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy bags of charcoal and onions

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es:
Teodoro de 67 años de edad tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta 8º grado, sus padres si creían en que el estudio le podía servir de mucho en la vida, está casado y su esposa le ayuda en el trabajo de la agricultura, tiene 6 hijos de los cuales solo 1 vive con ellos por lo cual son 2 personas las que dependen de él.



Teodoro se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, actividad que ha realizado desde que era muy pequeño pues se lo enseñaron sus padres, viaja 5 kilómetros en bicicleta para poder llegar hasta donde tiene su terreno en el cual trabaja, y lo hace en un horario de 7:00AM a 4:PM luego regresa a su casa a colaborar con las actividades del hogar.


El dinero del préstamo será utilizado para sembrar maíz, comprará los insumos necesarios. 

Él sueña con brindar los mejores estudios posibles a sus hijos para que tenga mejores oportunidades en la vida, y poder mejorar la condición de su casa que esta en muy mal estado.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 67 years old and had the opportunity to study through the eighth grade. His parents believed that an education would serve him well in life. Teodoro is married and his wife helps with the farm work. They have six children, but only one lives with them. Therefore, Teodoro has two people who are dependent on him.

Teodoro is devoted to agriculture and has been in this line of work from a very young age since his parents taught him the trade. He must travel five kilometers on a bicycle in order to reach the plot of land where he works. His schedule is from 7:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M. Afterwards, he returns home in order to help with the household chores.

The money he is requesting will be used for planting corn, so he will be able to buy the necessary supplies. Teodoro dreams of providing the best possible education for his children so that they can have better opportunities in life. He also wants to improve the condition of his house since it is in a very bad shape.

loans.use: to buy supplies for planting corn.

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza De Corcona Group

texts.es: Carmen tiene 34 años de edad es soltera con dos hijos educando. Ella implemento una pequeña bodega en su vivienda en donde ofrece abarrotes bebidas cerveza golosinas. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más cerveza gaseosa. El grupo “LA NUEVA ESPERANZA DE CORCONA” agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Carmen es la tercera del lado izquierdo viste casaca plomo y de la misma manera se encuentra adjuntada la foto de Gladys en la parte superior derecha que no pudo estar presente en la reunión por motivos laborales.
texts.en:
Carmen is 34 years old, single, and has two children in school. She started a small store in her home where she offers groceries, beverages, beer, and snack foods. This loan will be invested in the purchase of beer and sodas.

The group “Nueva Esperanza de Corcona” (New Hope of Corcona) is grateful to the Kiva lenders for providing this loan. Carmen is the third person in the photo standing on the left, wearing a gray jacket. The attached photo on the upper right-hand corner is that of Gladys, who was not able to attend the meeting because of work.

loans.use: to buy beer and sodas.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy food products

loans.name: Maxima

texts.en:
Maxima is 54 years old, married and had four children. She has a strong determination to succeed. Maxima manages a ukay-ukay (used clothing) business as source of income. She has been in her business for over eight years now, and earns enough income for the sustenance of the family. 

She wanted to increase her profits; that is why she added frozen meat products to sell such as hot dogs, longganisa (cured pork) and sausages, too. Now, she has insufficient fund to buy more goods; that is why she is asking for 20,000 Philippines pesos to buy more used clothing and frozen meat products to sell. She hopes to keep extending good products and services to gain customers' loyalty and acquire good income in return.

loans.use: to buy more used clothing and frozen meat products to sell

loans.name: José María

texts.es:
José de 64 años estudió hasta tercer grado, debido al bajo nivel económico en que vivía junto a sus padres, es viudo ya que su compañera de vida falleció hace varios años, de esa relación procrearon tres hijos, 2 de ellos están casados y solamente uno vive con él y es él que ha dejado de estudiar para ayudarlo en los trabajos del campo, ya que  es agricultor.

José se dedica a cultivar la tierra desde que estaba muy pequeño, sus padres se esmeraron en enseñarle este trabajo para que pudiera salir adelante y es asi como día con día se tiene que levantar muy temprano para ir al campo a trabajar.

Utizará el préstamo para comprar 2 sacos de sulfato, que le faltan para sacar adelante la cosecha que tiene ya sembrada.

El sueño de José es mejorar la calidad de vida para él y su hijo y poder mas adelante cultivar mayor cantidad de tierra para obtener mejores resultados.
texts.en: Jose is 64 years old and went to school up until the third grade, due to the hard economic circumstances he lived in with his parents. He's a widower, since his partner passed away several years ago, and that relationship produced three children. 2 of them are married and only one child lives with him, and that's the one who has stopped studying so as to help him with the field labor, since he's a farmer. Jose has worked in farming since he was very young. His parents went to great pains to teach him this job so that he could support himself and so every day he gets up early to go work in the fields. He'll use the loan to purchase 2 sacks of sulfate that he needs to harvest the crop he planted. Jose's dream is improve he and his son's quality of life and later on farm a larger piece of land to improve his yields.

loans.use: To purchase 2 sacks of sulfate, that he needs to harvest the crop he already planted.

loans.name: April

texts.en:
April is 23 years old and single. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

April has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. April requested a 4,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

April has been in this business for two years. In the future, April would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Valbona

texts.en:
This is Valbona and Arjan, husband and wife, and their 15-year-old son. Kindly note that their son, who was born disabled, wanted to be photographed with his parents; this is why he is seen in the picture excited. Arjan was born with some spinal disability as well. Thus, Valbona, this hardworking mother and wife, never stops working to provide for everyone in the family. She’s seeking your compassion to lend to her so that she can buy pesticides and cabbage seedlings. She and Arjan are thanking you in advance for the financial help.

Valbona and Arjan are members of the Egyptian community living in southern Albania in the district of Korca, near the lake Ohrid. They have three children ranging in age from 8 to 15 years old. They do agriculture; they plant and sell fresh produce, particularly potatoes and cabbage, at the farmer’s market in their nearby town; they also have a few apple orchards and sell apple fruits as well.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and cabbage seedlings

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy plastic-ware and kitchen utensils

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase merchandise (polo shirts, sweaters, pants, coats, among other things)

loans.name: Orlando De Jesus

texts.es: Orlando tiene 46 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa. Orlando es albañil y ademas trabaja como empleado en una institución cercana a su localidad. De esta forma logra llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantiene la economía de su familia. Orlando  desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivida por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un corredor para lo cual necesita materiales como: lámina galvanizada y polines. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la construcción.
texts.en:
Orlando is 46 years old and resides in his own home along with his wife. He is a bricklayer, but he is also employed at an institution near his town. Working in this manner enables him to sustain his household and maintain his family’s finances.

Orlando wants to improve his living conditions, so he is requesting this loan from FUSAI. He will invest in the construction of a corridor, so needs to buy necessary materials such as galvanized sheets and lumber. Orlando hopes to receive this loan so that he can begin construction.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to build a corridor in his home.

loans.name: Loreen Hazel

texts.en:
Loreen Hazel is very dedicated to her studies and wants to improve the living of her family. She lives in Zamboanga del Sur with her family, and she helps them earning a living. She works on their laundry, especially on weekends, while her parents are busy in their business activities. 

She joined GDMPC recently and borrowed a new loan intended to pay the school tuition fee for the first semester. Hopeful to have a better future, she works for it with determination and prayer.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fee for the first semester

loans.name: Omar Yasith

texts.es: Omar un joven de tan solo 19 años de edad lleno de sueños y aspiraciones ne su vida en cual quiere pagarse sus estudios con el sudor de su frente, siempre ha querido estudiar producción agropecuaria y por ello comenzó con su negocio de cría de cerdos, una profesión común en su ciudad donde no solo destaca el precio si no la calidad y la belleza de los cerdos. Juan solicita un crédito para la compra de cerdos los cuales engordara para su posterior venta con el único objetivo de pagar sus estudios universitarios y progresar gracias a sus esfuerzo sin deberle nada a nadie excepto a su familia que le dio ese espíritu luchador y pujante.
texts.en: Omar is a young 19 year old full of hopes and dreams and wants to pay for school by dint of hard work. He's always wanted to study agricultural production and that's why he started his pig raising business, a common job in his city where the beauty and quality of the pigs, in addition to the price,  stand out. Juan is requesting a loan to purchase pigs that he'll fatten and subsequently sell with the objective of paying for college and getting ahead thanks to his efforts, without owing anything to anybody, except to his family that give him this hard-working and thriving spirit.

loans.use: To purchase pigs to fatten them, aiming to improve his income to pay for college.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for making various home improvements.

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.ru: Она Зухро. Ей 53 года. Она вдова. Зурхо мама троих детей. Ее сыну 21 года. Он работает в Российской Федерации. Дочери живет вместе с мамой им 14 и 16 лет. Она помогают Зухро по работе. Зухро в течение 4 лет занимается шитьем национальной женской одежды. И дополнительно также она работает уборщицей в школе. Для Зухро больше увлекается шитьем одежды. Она любит свою работу. На сегодняшний день, Зухро твердо для себя решила далее заниматься кройкой шитьем национальной одежды. По этой причине она хочет купить новую профессиональную швейную машинку. Так как она в финансовом плане не может себе позволить такую покупку она просит у Вас поддержки.
texts.en: This is Zuhro. She is 53 years old and a widow. Zuhro is a mother of three children. Her son is 21 years old. He works in the Russian Federation. The daughters live together with the mother and they are 14 and 16 years old. They help Zuhro with work. Zuhro has been involved in sewing women's national clothing for 4 years. Additionally she works as a janitor at a school. Zuhro is more interested in sewing clothing. She loves her work. Today, Zuhro decided with certainty that she will continue being involved in sewing national clothing. This is why she wants to purchase a new professional sewing machine. She is requesting Your support because her finances do not allow her to make this purchase.

loans.use: to purchase a new professional sewing machine

loans.name: My

texts.en: My is 47 years old. She is a widow with four children in Odong, Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She is a farmer and earns approximately $1 per day. Three of her children are employed and earn approximately $15 per day. Now, she would like to apply for a loan of $1,000 to build a house. This loan will help her family live in better conditions. In the future, she hopes that she can build a bathroom and her last child can get a high school diploma.

loans.use: to build a house

loans.name: Miguel De Jesús

texts.es:
Miguel de 55 años de edad por falta de recursos económicos solo estudió hasta primer grado, era el mayor de sus hermanos y tenia que ayudar a sus padres a trabajar. Está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios de la casa, tiene 7 hijos de los cuales solo 2 viven con ellos ya que los demás están casados por lo cual son 3 personas las que dependen de el. 


Miguel actualmente se dedica a trabajar de albañil, actividad que realiza desde hace 28 años, lo aprendió de ver como trabajaban sus tíos, además trabaja en la agricultura y lo aprendió de sus padres, sus dos hijos menores se involucran y se traslada cerca de 3 kilómetros en bicicleta para llegar a su parcela, horario de trabajo no tiene pues hasta que termina lo programado para ese día regresa a casa.


El dinero del préstamo lo necesita para invertir en la siembra de maíz, pues en estos días es donde empiezan a movilizarse para trabajar en esta temporada.



Los sueños de Miguel son tener una mejor condición económica de la que hoy tiene, poder ayudar a sus hijos para que ellos tengan mejores oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
Miguel is 55 years old. Due to a lack of financial resources, he only received a first grade education. He is the oldest among his siblings, so he had to help his parents with the work. Miguel is married and his wife takes care of the household duties. They have seven children, but only two still live with them while the rest are married. Therefore, he has three people who are dependent on him.

Miguel currently works as a bricklayer, a trade that he has practiced for the past 28 years. He learned this line of work by observing his uncles. Miguel is also a farmer and learned the agriculture trade from his parents. His two youngest children are also involved in the work, so they must travel three kilometers by bicycle in order to reach the parcel of land that he owns. Miguel does not have a set schedule, so he returns home at the end of the day whenever all of his work is completed.

The money he is requesting will be invested in the planting of corn. This is about the time when people start getting ready to begin the work for that particular season. Miguel dreams of being in a better financial condition than where he is at today. He also wants to help his children so that they can have better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy supplies for planting corn.

loans.name: Amy

texts.en:
Amy works hard to support her family. She is married and has an electronics repair shop business in the Philippines.

Amy requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy new tools and equipment for her electronics repair shop.

Amy has been in this business for twelve years now, and also earns additional income from selling motorcycle parts.

In the future, Amy would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her electronics repair shop.

loans.name: Jawas Pankatitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “JAWAS PANKARITAS” iniciará el séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Tejada, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Verónica es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: taller de carpintería, atención de farnacia, tienda de abarrotes, venta de periódicos, venta de comida.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Verónica es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una compañera que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  farmacéutica; da a conocer que compro el negocio hace tres años con el primer crédito que obtuvo de Pro Mujer, ya que ella había estudiado en el área y anteriormente ya trabajó en un negocio identifico. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de medicamentos por mayor) que adquirirá de las farmacéuticas mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "JAWAS PANKRITAS" will initiate its seventh cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Villa Tejada. The communal bank is made up of nine members, and is led by a board in which Veronica serves as its president. The members of the communal association operate diverse businesses that include a carpentry shop, a pharmacy, a grocery store, newspaper sales and food sales.

The loan they are seeking will benefit the budding micro-business in which Veronica is a member. She says that it has been three years since she joined Pro Mujer, via an invitation from a colleague who is a client of the institution. Currently, she has a pharmacy business; she reveals that she bought the business three years ago with the first loan secured by Pro Mujer, since she had previously studied in this area and had previously worked in an identical business.

The loan she currently requests is for increasing capital (purchasing medicines in bulk), which she will acquire from the pharmacy wholesalers in the city of La Paz and subsequently will sell them in her retail space. This type of work will allow her to generate the resources to support her family, as she is married and has five children.
 
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says the training sessions offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy medicines in bulk

loans.name: Maftuna

texts.ru: Мафтуна 26-летняя молодая женщина из района Дж.Расулова города Худжанд, имееет мужа и двоих детей. Ее детям по 4 и 6 лет, они ходят в детский сад. А муж вместе с Мафтуной занимается растениеводством и животноводством. Это типичные деятельности для жителей сельских районов. Мафтуна и ее муж в основном разводят быков для дальнейшей продажи. Животноводством они занимаются уже 5 лет. Сейчас они хотят расширить эту свою деятельность и в связи с этим Мафтуна просит кредит для купли нескольких быков хорошей породы. Это кредит им важен для развития их животноводческого хозяйства.
texts.en: Maftuna is a 26-year-old young woman from the J. Rasulov district of the city of Khujand. She has a husband and two children. Her children are 4 and 6 years old, and they attend a kindergarten. And Maftuna and her husband are involved in agriculture and animal husbandry. These are typical activities for the residents of rural districts. Maftuna and her husband primarily raise bulls for future sale. They have been involved in animal husbandry for 5 years. Now they want to expand this business and Maftuna is requesting this loan to buy several good-breed bulls for this purpose. This is loan is important for developing their animal husbandry business.

loans.use: to buy several good-breed bulls for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras De Huampani Group

texts.es: El grupo “LAS TRIUNFADORAS DE HUAMPANI” está conformada por socios dedicados al comercio minorista. Maria tiene 44 años de edad es casada con 02 hijos educando. Ella implemento cabinas  de internet hace 04 y a la vende productos de belleza  zapatos a través de catálogos.  Años atrás se dedicaba a la costura. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de teclados y auriculares para sus cabinas. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Maria es la segunda del lado izquierdo viste casaca marrón.
texts.en:
The group "Las Triunfadoras de Huampani" consists of members who are devoted to their small businesses.

Maria is 44 years old, married, and has two children who are in school. She manages four Internet booths and also sells beauty products and shoes through catalogs. Years ago she was a seamstress. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of keyboards and headsets for her Internet booths.

This group is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the loan that has been provided. In the photo, Maria is standing second to the left and wearing a brown jacket.

loans.use: to buy new keyboards and headsets for her Internet booths.

loans.name: Oneyda Yamileth

texts.es:
La señora Oneyda  de 34  años  de edad,  vive con sus dos hijos  en su casa de habitación, se dedica desde hace 05 años al negocio de venta de abarrotería en general como ser: arroz, frijoles, maíz, pastas de tomate, churros, jabón, frescos, verduras, lácteos, embutidos y pollo.
Doña Oneyda su venta es con los vecinos y amigos que a diario visitan su negocio es una mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante.
Doña Oneyda está solicitando el préstamo para compra de más como ser azúcar, arroz, frijoles, agua, mantequilla, huevos, manteca, pan, etc. porque necesita invertir más en su negocio para lograr más ganancias, es su segundo préstamo que tiene con Prisma y es una muy buena clienta. 
Su sueño es en un futuro poder mejorar su casa porque es de adobe y desea repararla.


San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Mayo del 2014.
texts.en:
Oneyda, 34, lives with her two children in her home.  For five years she has been running a grocery store selling goods such as rice, beans, corn, tomato sauce, donuts, soap, fresh produce, vegetables, dairy products, sausage and chicken.  She sells to neighbors and friends who visit her every day.  She is a hard worker with a desire to get ahead.

Oneyda is requesting a loan to buy more goods such as sugar, rice, beans, water, butter, eggs, lard, bread, etc. because she needs to invest in her business to increase her profit.  It is her second loan through Prima and she is a very good client.

Her dream for the future is to renovate and repair her house which is made of adobe.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May, 2014

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, beans, water, butter, eggs, lard, bread, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Hebner Jorge

texts.es:
Hebner es un estudiante universitario tiene 22 años y es soltero.
Es el hermano del medio de 4 hermanos, terminó la secundaria en una escuela nocturna porque en el día lo dedica a la venta de artículos de ferretería.
Hebner se hace cargo de sus gastos y también ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Sus sueños lo hacen continuar con sus estudios y trabajo. Él estudia medicina en la especialidad de fonoaudiología y quiere prepararse muy bien para su futuro, aunque casi todos los días lo ocupa en su trabajo se dá modos para conseguir los apuntes diarios de sus trabajos y sus clases; ¨a veces dejo reemplazo en la ferretería, y otras veces me graban las clases en cinta también me presto apuntes de mis compañeros y algunas veces asisto a clases así logro avanzar poco a poco¨ Hebner hace de todo y se dá modos para continuar sus estudios, es por estos motivos que Hebner solicita un préstamo para culminar toda su carrera universitaria y poder realizar el trabajo que más le gusta.
texts.en:
Hebner, 22, is a university student and single.  He is the middle brother of four siblings and finished high school by studying at night because during the day he worked selling hardware.

Hebner covers his own expenses and also helps out at home.  His dream is to continue his education and work.  He is studying medicine and specializing in phonoaudiology.  He wants to prepare well for the future although he is busy with work almost every day.  He has different ways of getting notes from class:  "Sometimes I leave a replacement worker in the hardware store and other times colleagues record to class or lend me their notes.  Other times I go to class, and this is how I advance little by little."

Hebner does all he can to continue his education.  This is why he is requesting a loan to finish his degree and work in what he loves most.

loans.use: To finish his degree and work in what he loves most.

loans.name: Luz De America Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LUZ DE AMERICA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Tejada, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Martha es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de pollo, venta de dulces y jugos, tornería, taller de costura, librería y fotocopiadoras, venta de comida.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Martha es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una compañera que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendio recientemente, ya que anteriormente realizaba servicio de té, con un poco capital decide implementar este negocio. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de verduras por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es soltera y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el servicio de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "LUZ DE AMERICA" is beginning its second Pro Mujer cycle through the social center in Villa Tejada.  The group is comprised of eight members whose board of directors is led by Martha, the president.  They have different businesses such as sales of chicken, sweets and juices, food, woodturning, sewing, a bookstore and photocopying.

The loan they are receiving will benefit small business owners such as Martha.  She joined Pro Mujer a year ago by invitation through another client of the institution.  Her current business is selling food which she recently started.  She used to sell tea but decided to start this business with a small amount of capital.

She will use the loan to increase her working capital and buy vegetables wholesale from dealers in the city of La Paz.  Afterwards, she will sell them at her stall.  Her work generates resources to support her family.  She is single and has five children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds saying she enjoys the health service offered by the institution.

loans.use: To buy vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Savlatbi

texts.ru: Савлатби 54 года. Она замужем и мама троих взрослых детей. Ее муж занимается торговлей на рынке. Сыновьям 30 и 28 лет. Савлатби вместе с семьей живет в городке Куляб. Она по природе спокойная, милая и отзывчивая. Она в течение несколько лет занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она намерена дальше продолжать свою деятельность и поэтому, решилась обратиться кредит, чтобы приобрести швейную машинку. Ей не хватает определенной суммы денег, чтобы купить швейную машинку. Она верит в Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Savlatbi is 54 years old. She is married and a mother of three grown children. Her husband is involved in sales at a market. The sons are 30 and 28 years old. Savlatbi lives with her family in the city of Kulob. She has a calm, cute and responsive nature. She has been involved in sewing women's clothing for several years. She intends to continue her business and decided to request this loan in order to purchase a sewing machine. She is short of a set amount of money to purchase a sewing machine. She believes in Your support.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy dough, food coloring, chicken, spices, leaves for tamales, etc.

loans.name: Daniela Esther

texts.es:
Daniela es una mujer joven e 24 años de edad soltera y sin hijos.
Le gusta mucho estudiar es muy aplicada y siempre fue la mejor alumna de su curso, su tiempo libre lo dedica a la repostería y hace degustar a sus familiares, quienes todos los domingos le visitan he impulsan para que hornee.
Daniela tiene muchos sueños el principal es ser profesional, le gustaría conseguir un buen trabajo y dedicarse a ejercer su profesión también sueña con una familia numerosa y casarse;¨mis sueños parecen un cuento de hadas, pero soñar no cuesta nada¨ actualmente trabaja como secretaria en una empresa de transporte, es el sostén de su hogar y se hace cargo de todas las cuentas, sus padres son bastante ancianos no trabajan y viven de su jubilación.
Daniela se siente muy orgullosa de poder contribuir a quienes le dieron la vida, ¨mis padres son mi vida sin ellos no estaría en este mundo¨.
Daniela Solicita el préstamo para la compra de libros cuadernos y gastos escolares.
texts.en:
Daniela, 24, is a young woman who is single and has no children.  She loves to study and is very diligent, and always at the top of her class.  In her free time, she enjoys making pastry which she shares with family on sundays when they visit and encourage her to bake.

Daniela has many goals but the main one is to become a professional and get a good job.  She also wants to get married and have a large family.  "My dreams sound like a fairytale, but dreaming does not cost anything."  She currently works as a secretary for a transportation company.  She supports her household and does all the bookkeeping since her parents are eldery and live off their pension.

Daniela is very proud of being able to help her parents, "My parents are my life and without them I would not be in this world."  She is requesting a loan to buy books and notebooks, and to cover school expenses.

loans.use: To buy books and notebooks and cover school expenses.

loans.name: Gomersinda

texts.en:
Gomersinda works hard to support her family. Gomersinda is married and has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines.
She requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.
Gomersinda has been in this business for 12 years now.
In the future, Gomersinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 47 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, soap, shampoo, etc.

Wilma has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and earns additional income from farming sugarcane and corn.

Wilma aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, soap, and shampoo

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa is 52 years old and married with six children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 4,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell.

She has been running the general store for 10 years and earns additional income from food vending.

Ma. Teresa aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 59 years old and married with four children, one of whom is in school. Lolita works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, chips, noodles, etc.

Lolita has been in this business for three years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, chips, and noodles

loans.name: Romela

texts.en:
Romela is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 40,000 through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment for her fishing business.

Romela has successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is listing Romela's business profile in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Drita

texts.en:
This is Drita, an Egyptian Albanian lady whose name in English means ‘light’. She had heart surgery about a year ago, but she hasn’t been feeling well since then. This is why she needs your compassion this time. A loan of 100,000 Albanian Lek (ALL) will help her go to a good heart specialist in the capital city for a further visitation. Drita will be very appreciative of all of you for your financial help.

Drita is married and has two children. Her oldest son was hit in the head at a very young age and he’s been disabled ever since, unfortunately. She stitches clothes sometimes to earn a little money, but her illness doesn’t allow her to do much. Her husband sells a variety of items in an attempt to feed them all.

loans.use: to pay to visit a heart specialist

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 26 years old and married with three children.
She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like shampoo and groceries.
Mary Jane has borrowed and paid back two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from farming corn.
She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie is 52 years old and married with seven children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell of charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Elvie has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell of charcoal business for 30 years and earns additional income from her general store.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her land

loans.name: Zeta

texts.en:
Zeta is 48 years old and married with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Zeta has a handicraft business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy new supplies for her handicraft.

Zeta has been in this business for eleven years. In the future, Zeta would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new supplies for her handicraft.

loans.name: Twunguke Group

texts.fr:
Dieudonné fait partie du groupe  Twunguke  et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 32 ans et est marié à Adélaïde une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants âgés de 7 mois à 5 ans, dont 3 étudient.

Il fait le commerce de  la bière industrielle, du pain, et des vaches  depuis 5 ans. 

C’est son premier  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une vache, à revendre  pour gagner plus.

Dans les années les prochaines, il voudrait voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Dieudonné is a member of the Twunguke group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 32 years old and is married to Adelaide, a merchant. Together they have five children, from seven months to five years old. Three of the children go to school.

Dieudonné has been selling beer, bread, and cows for five years. This is his first loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, he is going to increase his capital to buy a cow, which he will resell and earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to see his children go to school.

loans.use: to buy a cow to resell

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 44 years old and married with four children.  With two children in school, Elsie works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as shampoo and groceries.

Elsie has been in this business for 4 years.

In the future Elsie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 37 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell such as shampoo and groceries.

Marites has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 13 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell such as shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Sonny

texts.en: Sonny is 31 years old, married but has no children yet. She currently resides in a rural community and manages a small retail store. Due to the high cost of commodities, she aims to make her business profitable in order to generate sufficient income and satisfy their daily necessities. She planned to increase her product offerings but she has insufficient capital. For this reason, Sonny is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy additional stocks of rice, groceries and soft drinks to resell. Through this loan, she believes that someday she will make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of rice, groceries and soft drinks to resell

loans.name: Kisenyi Kasojo Group

texts.en: Theopista is a 55-year-old widowed lady with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She is a member of the Kisenyi Kasojo group, with which she has been accessing a loan facility to enable her to run her fruit-selling business, alongside farming. She faces challenges of perishability of the stock leading to losses. However, she hopes to expand her business and build a house. She has asked for a loan to buy more fresh foods to sell.

loans.use: to buy more fresh foods to sell.

loans.name: Margarit

texts.en:
This nice and smiling lady’s name is Margarit and she lives with her family in Yerevan city. She is 53 years old. Margarit graduated from Choreographic College and for six years she worked as a dance teacher. As she says she likes her profession very much and she never thought that someday she would give up her dancing occupation, but now she is engaged in a very different and more profitable work; she works as a financial officer in a private company. Margarit is married and she has a son. Margarit says that she is also already a grandmother and her grandson has become the most precious and important little man for her. Margarit’s husband and son also work and they all try to support each other and provide their lovely family with good living conditions. 
Margarit asks for this loan as she needs some dental treatment. This loan of 400,000 Armenian drams will be of great use and support for her, in order not to cause her family any financial distress.

loans.use: to pay for her dental treatment

loans.name: Rositas De Chejecucho Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSITAS DE CHEJECUCHO” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Achacachi, está compuesta por diez  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Olinda es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de cebolla, venta de papa y chuño, agricultura, venta de fruta, tejido de mantas.
 
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Olinda es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su domicilio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de producción y venta de cebolla; da a conocer que este negocio fue un negocio familiar y que cuando se casó deciden seguir realizando el mismo negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para alimento en tiempo de sequía (compra semilla) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y lo cultivará en su chacra. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen existe una socia que no aparece, ella se fue de inmediato a su domicilio a cuidar a su ganado.
texts.en:
The “ROSITAS DE CHEJECUCHO” communal bank is beginning its second loan cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Achacachi. It is made up of 10 members and is directed by a board of directors where señora Olinda is President. The communal bank's members have various businesses, among which are: onion sales, potato and freeze-dried potato sales, agriculture, fruit sales, and blanket-weaving.
 
The loan which they will receive will benefit small micro businesses where señora Olinda is a member. She says that she became part of Pro Mujer one year ago, after the invitation of one of the organisation's promoters, who went to visit her at her home. She currently has a business producing and selling onion - she explains that this was a family business and that when she got married they decided to continue with it.
 
The loan which she will receive now is for food in times of drought (buying seeds), which she will acquire from the sellers at the El Alto city fairs and grow in her allotment. This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family, as she is married and has a son.  

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the training that the organisation offers.

There is one member missing from the picture. She went home to look after her livestock.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to create a better water absorption system for his crops and deliver a high-quality product to his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seasonal goods to supply her clothing sales business.

loans.name: Kayimbaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KAYIMBAYA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Tejada, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Hermenegilda es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de celulares, venta de ropa, tienda de ropa, taller de carpintería, venta de comida, tejido de mantas, venta de salchipapas (comida), venta de ají, venta de condimentos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Hermenegilda es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un promotor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su domicilio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de legumbres; da a conocer que este negocio lo hace varios años atrás, al apoyar a sus padres que tenían la misma actividad. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de semillas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo cultivará en su espacio de siembra. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el servicio de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank “KAYIMBAYA” is beginning its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Villa Tejada. It is made up of nine members and is directed by a board of directors where señora Hermenegilda is President. The members of the communal bank have various businesses, among which there are: mobile phone sales, clothing sales, a clothing shop, a carpentry workshop, food sales, blanket-weaving, kebab sales, pepper sales, and condiment sales.

The loan which they will receive will benefit small micro businesses where señora Hermenegilda is a member. She says that she became a member of Pro Mujer one year ago, after the invitation of one of the organisation's promoters who came to visit her at her home. She currently has a business selling pulses. She explains that she started this business several years ago to support her parents, who did the same work. 
 
The loan which she will receive now is to increase capital (buying seeds wholesale), which she will acquire from the wholesale sellers in La Paz and later grow in her allotment. This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family, as she is married and has two children.  

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health service that the organisation offers.

loans.use: to buy seeds wholesale.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia es una mujer de 46 años de edad es soltera y no tiene hijos, toda su vida la pasó junto a su madre ayudándole en todo y cuidándola, cuando era niña le preparaba el desayuno a  mamá y mamá le preparaba el almuerzo, ¨siempre sentí que era yo quien la cuidaba¨ ella y su madre son un equipo sólo se tiene la una  a la otra y comparten todo.
Lidia se dedica al comercio de electrodomésticos no tiene un lugar de venta fijo por lo que es una vendedora ambulante, sueña con tener una tienda fija para trabajar y así sacar a su madre adelante.
Lidia no pudo estudiar la vida le enseño todo lo que sabe, a pesar de todas las dificultades por las que pasa ella es feliz junto a su ser más preciado su madre. Ambas conocen lo duro que es el trabajo en la calle y luchan juntas día a  día por sobrevivir. Es por mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y su madre que lidia solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería y electrodomésticos.
texts.en:
Lidia is a 46-year-old woman who is single and doesn't have any children. She has spent her whole life with her mother, helping her in everything and caring for her. When she was a child she would prepare breakfast for her mother, and her mother would prepare lunch for her. "I always felt like it was me that looked after her". She and her mother are a team; they only have each other and they share everything.

Lidia works selling electrical appliances. As she doesn't have a fixed place to sell, she is a street seller. She dreams of having a fixed shop to work in and in that way to help improve her mother's life.

Lidia couldn't study and so life taught her everything that she knows. Despite all the difficulties she faces every day, she is happy together with her most beloved mother. Both know how hard it is to work in the street and they fight together every day to survive. It is to improve her and her mother's lives that Lidia is applying for a loan to buy goods and electrical appliances.

loans.use: to buy goods and electrical appliances.

loans.name: Lonie

texts.en: As a married parent of three children, Lonie works hard to support her family. She has a business buying and selling ready to wear clothing in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Lonie is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional items likes shirts, pants, etc., to sell. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items likes shirts, pants, etc., to sell

loans.name: Elma

texts.en: Elma is 30 years old, married, and has one child who is in school. She is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her livestock. Elma has been raising livestock for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her livestock.

loans.name: Juan Enrique

texts.es:
Juan de 33 años de edad, es un agricultor que no tuvo la oportunidad de tener un grado económico, ya que cuando él era un niño vivía en una zona muy rural alejada y no había ningún tipo de servicio que el gobierno brinda tales como salud, educación,  entre otros.  Ahora vive junto a su padre quien está un poco enfermo y él tiene que llevar las riendas del hogar.

Él se ha dedicado prácticamente toda su vida a la agricultura,  cuando era joven sembraba maíz y frijol pero trabajaba mucho y no obtenía las ganancias esperadas.  Hoy en día tiene 5 años de dedicarse al cultivo de la jícama, este cultivo requiere de menos gastos y menos trabajo ya que solo hay que estar  muy pendiente a la hora de la siembra y solo estar dando unas revisadas al cultivo por las plagas además no requiere de mucho gasto en insumos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para sembrar tres hectáreas de jícama,  ya que el año pasado le dio una excelente producción agrícola ahora en este año ya se está preparando para preparar la tierra y para ello necesita rentar las tierras que cultivara y la otra parte del dinero será invertido en la compra de semillas para la siembra, abonos, foliares, entre otros más.
texts.en:
Juan is 33 years old. He is a farmer who didn't have the opportunity to have an education. When he was a boy, he lived in an very rural area and there wasn't any type of service offered by the government like health, education, or others. Now he lives with his father who is a little sick, and he has to take the reins of the household.  

He has worked practically his whole life in farming. When he was young, he planted corn and beans but he worked a lot and didn't make the expected profits. Now he has been growing jicama for 5 years. This crop requires fewer expenses and less work. He just has to be very careful when planting and then check the crop for pests. It also doesn't require a lot of expense for materials.  

The loan he is asking for is to plant three hectares of jicama. Last year he has an excellent yield and this year he is getting ready to prepare the soil. For that he needs to rent the land that he will cultivate and another part of the money will  be invested in buying seeds, fertilizer, foliar spray and more.

loans.use: to rent the land he will cultivate and another part of the money will be invested in buying seeds, fertilizer, foliar spray, and more.

loans.name: Mylen

texts.en: Mylen is 34 years old and married with two children who are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.
